description.english: Complete 50 Team Up Mission Sub Missions

displayName.koreana: 사람들을 미소 짓게 만들 수 있을지도 몰라
displayName.tchinese: 也許能夠讓大家重拾笑容
displayName.japanese: 人を笑顔にできるかもしれない
displayName.german: Vielleicht bringe ich Menschen zum Lächeln
displayName.french: Être capable de faire sourire les gens.
displayName.spanish: Tal vez... logre hacer sonreír a alguien.

displayName.tchinese: 致力於保護未來的人們

displayName.english: I'm Glad We Can All Go Together
displayName.koreana: 모두 함께 갈 수 있어서 다행이야
displayName.tchinese: 大家都能參加真是太好了
displayName.japanese: 全員で行けて良かったね
displayName.german: Schön, dass wir gemeinsam gehen konnten
displayName.french: Content qu'on puisse y aller ensemble.
displayName.italian: Per fortuna siamo venuti tutti assieme
displayName.spanish: Menos mal que fuimos todos juntos.

description.english: Collect a total of 10 Assist Characters in Team Up Missions

displayName.japanese: 弱音吐くワケないでしょう

displayName.english: A Great Show Requires Great Supporters

displayName.spanish: Esta vez, nosotros somos los protagonistas.
